name: Disney Film Challenge Quiz | Movie Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: In which Disney film features the crooks, Jasper and Horace?
What does Dumbo do to make his ears enlarge to huge proportions?
Who provides the voice of Esmeralda in 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame'?
What is the name of the skunk in 'Bambi'?
In which Disney film features the songs, 'That's What Friends Are For' and 'Colonel Hathi's March?
What is the name of the Isle that Eglantine and friends journey into the pages of a story book, a kingdom ruled by animals in 'Bedknobs and Broomsticks'?
Which Disney film features Terk, Kala and Clayton?
What is the name of Mulan's guardian dragon who accompanies her?
In 'Who Framed Roger Rabbit', Bob Hoskins plays private eye Eddie ... ?
What number is seen on the Herbie Volkswagen Beetle in 'The Love Bug'?
Which Disney film features the songs 'Your Mother and Mine' and 'What Makes the Red Man Red'?
What is the name of the cat and the goldfish in Pinocchio?
In 'The Little Mermaid', Ariel is the headstrong teenage daughter of which undersea world king?
Which animal in 'The Jungle Book' was voiced by George Sanders?
In 'The Sword in the Stone' what is the name of Merlin the magician's pet owl?
What is the name of Dumbo's mouse friend with whom he becomes inseparable pals?
Which film features Patti Mayonnaise, Porkchop and Skeeter?
In which Disney film features the song 'Bibbidy Bobbidi Boo?
options: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
questions.explanation:
Cinderella.

	This bouncy song sung by the Fairy Godmother.

questions.text: Which is NOT one of the three good fairies in 'Sleeping Beauty'?
questions.explanation:
Briar Rose.

	Aurora called Briar Rose during her stay with the Fairies

questions.text: In which Disney film does the Blue Fairy appear?
Which Disney film heralds the song 'Pink Elephants on Parade'?
In what year is Mary Poppins set?
In 'Toy Story 2' who is the voice of Stinky Pete, the Prospector?
In Fantasia 2000 who was NOT one of the hosts?
In 'Mary Poppins', one of the Banks' neighbours is a precise military man who fires his rooftop cannon at eight o'clock every morning and every evening at six o'clock. Name him?
questions.explanation:
Admiral Boom.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
